section.body:
*The pony grunts in response.*
..Hello, I'm Schorcht, blacksmith, look at my wares or leave me to my work.

You have fought ghosts?
You should talk with Tinkerspark. But if you bring me some obsidian I can craft you a dagger to deal with them.
If you are lucky, you can find that in the cavern deep forest. Its dangerous to go there alone, you should buy a sword.
